archimate:Folder.name: Create Policy
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Technology helps us to solve problems, but they are vulnerable to several types of threats. Any kind of lost or unavailability could be too dangerous for small and big companies. So, information security is a basic investment. But, how do you decide what kind of investments are necessary?
First of all, you must know the cost of your business' downtime to protect it against failures.
